original_title: The Galactical North Pole lies in the Hair of Berenice
overview: The range of symbols is manifold and multi-layered, it is a film that utilises many fades, dissolves and double exposures. The "Galactic Northpole"- a fiction of astronomy, an assertion; Berenice had sacrificed her hair on the alter of a goddess in order to gain her approval. One becomes the victim of others - yet one also becomes a victim of oneself.
title: The Galactical North Pole lies in the Hair of Berenice
